content: As you approach, a large bloody miasma will block your advance. Once it congeals, you'll find yourself facing the last of the four captains.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
As you approach, a large bloody miasma will block your advance. Once it congeals, you'll find yourself facing the last of the four captains.
